	dispatchDeclaration  [line 32]





	

    

    
 
		void dispatchDeclaration(
property
&$property, value
&$value 
)
    

    



	
Deal with property declaration and set its default value.



Deal with property declaration and set its default value. Declared property has integer index assigned and it's value should be it's name thous string is expected.

			Parameters:

			

					

				property  
				
				&$property: 
				
				 A property to declare sent by reference			

					

				value  
				
				&$value: 
				
				 Value of the property sent by reference			

				


	

	API Tags:
